Uses of Class
org.apache.datasketches.theta.UpdateSketch

Packages that use UpdateSketch
Package
Description
org.apache.datasketches.theta
The theta package contains the basic sketch classes that are members of the Theta Sketch Framework.

  • Uses of UpdateSketch in org.apache.datasketches.theta

    Methods in org.apache.datasketches.theta that return UpdateSketch
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.build()
    Returns an UpdateSketch with the current configuration of this Builder.
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.build(MemorySegment dstSeg)
    Returns an UpdateSketch with the current configuration of this Builder with the specified backing destination MemorySegment store.
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.buildLocal(UpdateSketch shared)
    Returns a local, on-heap, concurrent UpdateSketch to be used as a per-thread local buffer along with the given concurrent shared UpdateSketch and the current configuration of this Builder.
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.buildShared()
    Returns an on-heap concurrent shared UpdateSketch with the current configuration of the Builder.
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.buildShared(MemorySegment dstSeg)
    Returns a concurrent shared UpdateSketch with the current configuration of the Builder and the given destination MemorySegment.
    UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketchBuilder.buildSharedFromSketch(UpdateSketch sketch, MemorySegment dstSeg)
    Returns a direct (potentially off-heap) concurrent shared UpdateSketch with the current configuration of the Builder, the data from the given sketch, and the given destination MemorySegment.
    static UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketch.heapify(MemorySegment srcSeg)
    Instantiates an on-heap UpdateSketch from a MemorySegment.
    static UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketch.heapify(MemorySegment srcSeg, long expectedSeed)
    Instantiates an on-heap UpdateSketch from a MemorySegment.
    static UpdateSketch
    Sketches.heapifyUpdateSketch(MemorySegment srcSeg)
    Convenience method, ref: UpdateSketch.heapify(MemorySegment)
    static UpdateSketch
    Sketches.heapifyUpdateSketch(MemorySegment srcSeg, long expectedSeed)
    Convenience method, ref: UpdateSketch.heapify(MemorySegment, long)
    abstract UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketch.rebuild()
    Rebuilds the hash table to remove dirty values or to reduce the size to nominal entries.
    static UpdateSketch
    UpdateSketch.wrap(MemorySegment srcWSeg)
    Wrap takes the writable sketch image in MemorySegment and refers to it directly.
    static UpdateSketch

    Wrap takes the sketch image in MemorySegment and refers to it directly.
